Content: Sometimes whenever I'm playing Expedition when I go to one of the minions that says "Greetings Master defeat another master and i'll help you out" I press battle and it says finding match and when i get into the match none of the criteria for getting more points is on the side and when i win I dont get anything and when i'm done it puts me on the challenges section and when i go back to expedition I have to battle another master again to get the rewards
